flowRoot.flowPara: The current message tray is comprised of two sets of UI: notifications and the tray itself; this is an experiment to see if this can be simplified
It also seeks to avoid some of the interaction problems associated with the accordion
Other notifications could peep up when the pointer is pushed against the bottom of a notification
Notifications have fixed widths and maintain their positions across the bottom of the screen; they are added from right to left
Clicking on a notification currently has inconsistent results: sometimes it opens a window, sometimes it dismisses the notification
It is impossible to associate a useful and positive action with every notification, and clicking on a notification should not produce a negative response
So, let's make notification bodies unreactive and make open and dismiss actions explicit
